mean_en: the process or a period of changing from one state or condition to another
sentence_phrase: the transition from youth to old age
sentence: Our body changes during the transition from youth to old age.
sentence_trans: 我们的身体在从青年到老年的转变过程中会经历很多变化。
word_etyma: transit转变 + ion名词后缀 → transition转变
